sections.historyText: The idea to found {partnerName} arose from the desire to have an establishment where food is not just satisfying taste, but a way to share care and hospitality. We started with a small menu, focusing on the quality of products, clean recipes, and service. From the very first days, we decided that delivery should be not only fast but also aesthetic: attention to packaging, food temperature, and preserving the taste. Over time, {partnerName} expanded its assortment, introduced signature recipes, seasonal offers, and customer feedback systems to constantly improve.

values.quality: Quality in detail - every ingredient, every cooking method is important, because details shape the taste.
values.hospitality: Hospitality and attention to the client - we strive for everyone to feel like a welcome guest, even when ordering from home.
values.convenience: Time and convenience - ordering must be simple, delivery fast, and the dishes must retain their taste and appearance.
values.innovation: Innovative approach - adaptation to modern trends, new menu formats, eco-friendly packaging, and digital solutions.
values.authenticity: Authenticity and transparency - honest ingredients, open prices, responsible attitude towards suppliers and standards.

offers.restaurantMenuPoint1: Diverse dishes - from traditional classics to our chef's signature items
offers.restaurantMenuPoint2: Fresh salads, appetizers, hot meals, and desserts for any mood
offers.deliveryPoint1: Convenient online ordering via website or mobile app
offers.deliveryPoint2: Fast and accurate delivery in eco-friendly packaging
offers.deliveryPoint3: Option for pre-ordering for a specific time
offers.healthyFoodPoint3: A balance of taste and health benefits
offers.specialOffersPoint1: Gift sets and boxes for friends and colleagues
offers.specialOffersPoint2: Business lunches delivered to the office
offers.specialOffersPoint3: Discounts for regular customers and a loyalty program
